system.descriptor: Recalling general knowledge on procedures, divisions, traditions, important individuals, superstitions, etc, for target group.
system.uses:
Use: Skill Test to Recall general/relevent knowledge, more DoS = better information.
Skill Groups: Adeptus Arbites, Adeptus Astra Telepathica, Adeptus Mechanicus, Adeptus Adminstratum, Ecclesiarchy, Imperial Creed, Imperial Guard, Imperial Navy, Imperium, Navis Nobilite, Rogue Traders, Tech, Underworld, War. And more specific ones such as: Calixis Sector,  Jericho Reach, Koronus Expanse, Screaming Vortex, Spinward Front, etc,

description.value: Recalling general knowledge on procedures, divisions, traditions, important individuals, superstitions, etc, for target group.
